parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

parameters.responseBody:
={{ {
  "query": $('Extract Parameters').first().json.query,
  "results": $('Parse Movies1').all().map(movie => ({
    "title": movie.json.title,
    "url": movie.json.url,
    "source": movie.json.source,
    "year": movie.json.year,
    "poster": movie.json.poster,
    "quality": movie.json.quality,
    "language": movie.json.language,
    "genre": movie.json.genre,
    "rating": movie.json.rating,
    "streamingUrls": $input.all().find(item => item.json.originalUrl === movie.json.url)?.json.streamingUrls || []
  })),
  "total": $('Parse Movies1').all().length,
  "message": "Found " + $('Parse Movies1').all().length + " movies with streaming URLs from 5movierulz.villas",
  "source": "5movierulz.villas",
  "timestamp": new Date().toISOString(),
  "success": true
} }}
